Comments
October 3, 2020
mc268
He may not be fully representative of what he can do, but this is a great dial for the cost. Perplex and free smoke cloud, full dial toughness, and some precision strike to back it up, pretty simple but very good in practice. I like that he has some range too, and decent enough stats to potentially do a little damage. Most times he just stayed behind my main attackers, perplexing them up and then throwing free smoke to protect himself and Black Cat. He also eventually moved up and got some hits in. I like him a lot, if for nothing else making my ASM Scarlet Spider have an 11 attack half the time.
August 28, 2020
DatHomieSilverSurfer
he should really have sort of ranged knockback/incap attack to combo with the smoke cloud special, and another click would also have been nice, but he's well costed and I'm a sucker for FREE map-control powers (barrier/smokecloud/force blast)
August 28, 2020
JonISNH Collectibles
I'm extremely glad to be getting a new Hobbie, but man is this dial kinda underwhelming. No B/C/F? Really?
